channel.title: YAY! but
channel.description:
yess now he items in my shop are not shoes! i fixed it... everything was set to the 10000 items and it had to be 20000
anyway things i need help on.
1.What codeing do i use to make it so i can only use that command. 2.What do i need to do to make it so that when u lvl u get a skill cape. 3.How do i get doors to keep shut

item.title: YAY! but
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

In process or where ever you want it to check; if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ID && getLevelForXP(playerXP[SKILL]) != 99) { // remove the item and do something ? }
replace ID with weapon ID, and SKILL with skill number. Change 99 to 135 if thats your max level.

Read full topic
